# Pets and The City

> Kansas City's premier personal pet sitting and dog walking service. Operated by Samantha Jones, providing trusted, one-on-one pet care across Kansas City, MO neighborhoods including Westport, The Plaza, Brookside, Midtown, Valentine, Hyde Park, and surrounding areas. 5-star rated with 25+ reviews.

## Business Summary

- **Business name:** Pets and The City
- **Owner / lead pet sitter:** Samantha Jones
- **Phone:** 701-509-3856
- **Email:** hello@petsandthecitykc.com
- **Website:** https://petsandthecitykc.com/
- **Instagram:** @petsandthecity_kc
- **Rover profile:** https://www.rover.com/promos/samanj56142/
- **Location:** Kansas City, Missouri, USA (39.0997°N, 94.5786°W)
- **Service radius:** ~15 miles from Kansas City, MO 64108
- **Rating:** 5-star (25+ verified reviews)
- **Payment accepted:** Cash, Venmo, Zelle
- **Price range:** Moderate ($$)
- **Business type:** Local pet care service / sole proprietor

## Services

### Dog Walking
- 30-minute walks and 60-minute walks available
- Solo walks — no dog packs, full individual attention
- GPS-tracked routes, photo updates sent to owner
- Leash manners and safety prioritized
- Suitable for dogs of all sizes and breeds

### Drop-In Pet Visits (Most Popular)
- 30-minute check-ins at the pet's home
- Feeding, fresh water, playtime, and litter box service
- Available for dogs, cats, and small animals
- Photo and update sent after every visit
- Ideal for busy owners, short trips, and daytime check-ins

### Overnight Pet Sitting
- Sitter stays at the client's home overnight
- Maintains the pet's normal home routine
- 12+ hours of companionship and care
- Reduces separation anxiety by keeping pets in familiar surroundings
- Includes feeding, walks, play, and bedtime routine

## Why Choose Pets and The City

- One-on-one personal care — not an app dispatching strangers
- Free meet & greet before the first booking
- Photo and real-time updates after every visit or walk
- Locally rooted in Kansas City — knows the neighborhoods, parks, and trails
- Insured and experienced with dogs, cats, and small animals
- Flexible scheduling including weekdays, weekends, and holidays
- Routine-respecting approach — pets stay on their established schedule

## FAQ Summary

**Q: Do you offer a meet and greet?**
A: Yes. Samantha offers a free meet & greet before the first booking so pets and owners can get comfortable.

**Q: How many dogs are walked at once?**
A: Only your dog. Solo walks only — no group or pack walks.

**Q: Do you care for cats?**
A: Yes. Drop-in visits and overnight stays are available for cats.

**Q: Are you insured?**
A: Yes.

**Q: How do I book?**
A: Text or call 701-509-3856, or email hello@petsandthecitykc.com. You can also book via Rover at https://www.rover.com/promos/samanj56142/

**Q: What neighborhoods do you serve?**
A: Westport, The Plaza, Brookside, Midtown, Crossroads, Hyde Park, Valentine, Volker, Waldo, and surrounding Kansas City areas. Contact Samantha to confirm your specific address.

**Q: What payment methods are accepted?**
A: Cash, Venmo, and Zelle.

## About Samantha Jones

Samantha Jones is the founder and sole operator of Pets and The City. A lifelong animal lover and Kansas City local, she launched the business to offer a more personal alternative to app-based pet care services. Samantha treats every pet like her own — following their routine, sending photo updates, and keeping owners informed throughout every visit or walk.
